pullRequest.title: restored old api of SingleHoverShowingHyperlinkPresenter
pullRequest.bodyText:

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich christian.dietrich@itemis.de

nodes.bodyText:
I'm still not a big fan of streams where the forEach modified some captured instance, e.g. the nullSafeList.
A old-school for loop may have been the better choice.
Since it looks correct though, I'll approve
